ygData.subject: Re: Bertoxx tinkering prices
ygData.msgSnippet: I m new to this list, I subscribed as I am starting a gnome char exclusively for trade skills and I am very interested in tinkering. I just wanted to say one
ygData.messageBody:
I'm new to this list, I subscribed as I am starting a gnome char exclusively
for trade skills and I am very interested in tinkering. I just wanted to say
one thing, I am very fond of strange, unusual, and interesting items in EQ.
I just bought a Collapsible Fishing Pole for 10pp, and if anyone on Fennin
Ro is interested in selling a spyglass for 50-60pp, give a tell to Lenolin,
and I'll buy one =)

- Lenolin Goldenoak, 29th level druid on Fennin Ro.

-----Original Message-----
From: Catbik Tinkerton <catbik@...>
To: EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com <EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com>
Date: Wednesday, October 20, 1999 4:43 PM
Subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] Bertoxx tinkering prices


>From: "Catbik Tinkerton" <catbik@...>
>
>
>>Has anyone actually made aprofit off of any of this yet.I am guessing that
>>it
>>will be quite hard just becaus ewho the hell is going to be willing to
>>pay75
>>pp for a spyglass or for that fact for anything we have there isnt much
>>demand for.
>
>I sold one Spyglass for 53pp. Another for 60pp.
>And a fishing pole for 40pp (It was a good friend of mine who bought it--
he
>felt sorry for me =) The number of tells I get is simply enormous, all just
>asking "Are they worth it?" Of course I say yes, but still I only had those
>3 buyers.
>
>I've decided I'm going to try selling the poles for 10pp and the spyglasses
>for 60pp (maybe 50pp) this week and see how it works out.
>
>Catbik Tinkerton
>God I wish they didn't take out jet packs from beta =(
>
>
